page.title: 08SPORTING FACILITIES
page.content: There are numerous sporting clubs. There are Football, hockey, cricket pitches and tennis courts provided by the Town Council and a Bowling Green. The Yateley centre also provides facilities for a very wide variety of sporting activities including a heated indoor swimming pool used by the people of Yateley and surrounding area. There are very many sporting clubs for children as well as adults There are 4 football clubs, 4 swimming clubs (including water polo), 2 badminton clubs and bowls, hockey and netball clubs. There are many opportunities for angling as well, both in privater and public waters where record catches of coarse fishing have been recorded.
